Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.COD_EMPRESA, T1.TIPREG, T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.DTMOVTO, T1.HORAOPER, T1.NOMFAV, T1.VAL_OPERACAO, T1.LIMCRR, T1.TIPFAV, T1.DATNEG, T1.FONPAG, T1.CODPSVI, T1.CODSVI, T1.NUMOPG, T1.NUMREC, T1.MOVPCS, T1.CODUSU, T1.SITCONTB, T1.SITUACAO, T1.TIMESTAMP, T1.COD_PRODUTO, T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO, T2.DES_OPERACAO, T2.DES_ABREVIADA, T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, seguros.v0histsini T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T1.OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND (T1.OPERACAO IN (101, 107, 108, 117, 118, 1001, 1002, 1003, 1004, 1009, 2010, 3010, 9001) OR (T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO IN ('JUR-INDENI', 'JUR-DESP', 'JUR-HON') AND T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO IN ('JBHON', 'JBDES', 'JBIND')) OR T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO = 'JUR-AVISO') ORDER BY T1.OCORHIST, T1.DTMOVTO END SQL
